mapper.select: SELECT r.roomcode, r.roomname, rt.typename, AVG(rr.rating) AS average_rating, rt.price, COUNT(rr.reviewcode) AS reservation_count FROM room r JOIN roomtype rt ON r.typecode = rt.typecode LEFT JOIN roombooking rb ON r.roomcode = rb.roomcode AND rb.bookingdate BETWEEN sysdate-30 and sysdate LEFT JOIN roomreview rr ON rb.bookingcode = rr.bookingcode JOIN hotel h ON r.hotelcode = h.hotelcode WHERE h.id = #{id} GROUP BY r.roomcode, r.roomname, rt.typename, rt.price

SELECT r.roomcode, r.roomname, rt.typename, AVG(rr.rating) AS average_rating, rt.price, COUNT(rr.reviewcode) AS reservation_count FROM room r JOIN roomtype rt ON r.typecode = rt.typecode LEFT JOIN roombooking rb ON r.roomcode = rb.roomcode AND rb.bookingdate BETWEEN sysdate-30 and sysdate LEFT JOIN roomreview rr ON rb.bookingcode = rr.bookingcode JOIN hotel h ON r.hotelcode = h.hotelcode WHERE h.id = #{id} and r.hotelcode=#{hotelcode} GROUP BY r.roomcode, r.roomname, rt.typename, rt.price
mapper.insert: insert into roomtype(typecode, hotelcode, typename, price, addprice, basiccapacity, maxcapacity, amenity, information) values('T'||to_char(lpad(seq_roomtype.nextval, 6, '0')),#{hotelcode},#{typename},#{price},#{addprice},#{basiccapacity},#{maxcapacity},#{amenity},#{information})
mapper.update: update roomtype set typename =#{typename}, amenity=#{amenity}, information=#{information}, price=#{price}, addprice=#{addprice}, basiccapacity=#{basiccapacity}, maxcapacity=#{maxcapacity} where typecode=#{typecode}
mapper.insert: insert into room(roomcode, hotelcode, typecode, servicecode, roomname) values('R'||to_char(lpad(seq_room.nextval, 6, '0')),#{hotelcode},#{typecode},#{servicecode},#{roomname})
